title: 'We won't stop': How Gen Zâ€™s anger became a global movement in 2025
summary: From Kathmandu to Lima, Generation Z took to the streets in 2025 to denounce inequality, corruption and political exclusion. Across the Global South, young people turned scattered local protests into a shared moment of mobilisation. FRANCE 24 looks back on a pivotal year for a generational movement set to remain in the spotlight in 2026.
